title: Mathematics Instructional Design Decision-Making Competency Enhancement for Technology Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and basic digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Strengthening the design and implementation experience of mathematics classes using mobile devices (tablets/smartphones) in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can apply a decision-making process using open-ended questions in technology-integrated lesson design with over 80% proficiency
Learners can create three or more math activity prototypes incorporating peer feedback through collaborative design
Learners can evaluate their technology integration decisions via reflective journaling and submit improvement plans with over 90% participation
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
